doc.field: Specifics (WNYF article incidents). World Trade Center. Policies & Procedures. Personal.
Specifics (WNYF article incidents). World Trade Center. Policies & Procedures. Personal.

Box holds various unrelated things. 3 folders re: Spadafora articles in WNYF, with docs and floppies: 4/2006 re: BQE fire, 4/2006 re: NYC Water Tunnel #3, and 2/2007 re: the John Jay College educational program for FDNY (good explanation of courses, etc.). "Apparatus Accident Packet" of blank forms for reporting, plus related safety bulletin (1998). Notebook/to-do's circa 2012, and other loose note pages and notebook on unclear topic. PANY&NY "general program coordination drawing: WTC Construction: Overall Upper Transit Hall Level" (2010). Queens North/14th Division exercise plan for December 6, 2011 (part of 2011 Command Post Exercise Series). Folder labeled "Field Units Phone #s and addresses" has unit location charts, vehicle assignments, FDNY cellular, pager and Nextel directories, etc. (circa early-mid 2000s); box has related documents loose throughout. Various laminated cards (position titles, organization charts, and contact codes) re: incident management (2003). Rules & regs for rifle & shotgun permit holders (circa 2001). Draft of Structural Collapse Rescue Operations procedure (2006) and a few other random procedures. FDNY Communications Manual (1996). Buckeye Pipe Line Assignments & Instruction (ca. 2000s). Citywide Incident Management System (CIMS) protocol document, marked "Car Copy" (2005).
